snippet.title: Let's Play: Divinity: Dragon Commander with Larian's Sven Vincke
snippet.description:
Divinity: Dragon Commander (http://j.mp/DraCom_Pre), an innovative fantasy real-time strategy game spliced with free-flight combat action, in-depth strategic view, and some trading card game mechanics, in which you become a fearsome Dragon Emperor. This is the recording of our live Q&A session with Sven Vincke and Farhang Namdar of the Larian Studios, the game's developer.

The game is currently available for pre-order on GOG.com. That's $39.99 until the game's release (planned for August). Check out the link for the details on the pre-order deal including two FREE GAMES, and extra content:  (http://j.mp/DraCom_Pre)
